content.description: This gem is waiting for an ascent. When first glancing at it it looks simple, that is until you try crankin' on it. Big features with even bigger moves. Git on it!
content.location: Climb obvious huge overhanging prow on the Titan boulder

content.description: Located in the upper area above the buzz bomb and jones' roof is a nice little warm up wall. there are 4-5 decent problems here that have extremely fun topout cruxes. Stay cool and be patient and there's nothing to worry about.
content.location: first wall one comes to when hiking in from above, approx 250ft east of the Titan boulder

content.description: Sweet hidden overhang problem. Start on good underclings and make big moves straight over the roof. Things get brutal at the lip!
content.location: Up and right from Buzz Bomb approx. 20ft

content.description: Buzz Bomb is the beautiful headstone feature with a flaring seam running right up the center. Left, direct and right faces are all super fun.
content.location: Lower right anchor to this area.

content.description: You hiked all the way out to Boomtown, so you may as well climb a little bit...This problem climbs out of the pit between Buzz Bomb and Jones' Roof.  Start matched on a good edge, and climb straight up through the crack, and top out.
content.protection: Pads, I guess, you probably shouldn't fall either way.
content.location: Between Buzz Bomb and Jones' Roof

content.description: Climb face left of the arete on the Titan boulder, capped by a triangular prow & press it out. Enjoy the ride if you miss the huck!
content.location: 10 feet left of big arete, immediately left of broken trough on the face.

content.description: The area is a small cirque facing south and has approx. 15 developed problems most of which are super good. Steep roof problems a delicate crack/face very similar to the flat iron and a wall named the shadow wall are just a few of the developed problems. the showpeice chunk of rock is the titan boulder which is full tilt and highball. Only one line has been done it ever and its unrepeated! Get out therer and clean it up! For more info...
